alert.note: Alert for Bradley; East Polk; Hamilton; West Polk (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 15 at 2:29AM CST until January 16 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches with locally higher totals on ridge tops. * WHERE...Hamilton, Bradley, West Polk and East Polk Counties. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...There may be a large gradient in accumulations from north to south across Hamilton, Bradley, and Polk Counties. Areas near the Georgia state line may see a wintry mix at times which will result in lower snowfall accumulation. In addition, wind chills will be near zero at times, especially across higher elevations and ridge tops. The cold wind chills could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Bradley; East Polk; Hamilton; West Polk
